ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(Bypass_Validation__c), OR(ISCHANGED( Deal_Reg_Exp_Date__c ), ISCHANGED( Deal_Reg_Tracking_No__c ), ISCHANGED( Deal_Reg_Status__c ), ISCHANGED( Deal_Reg_Type__c )), NOT ( OR ( $Profile.Name = 'Apollo: Custom- Sales Operations', $Profile.Name = 'Apollo: Custom- Customer Services', $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Permission.Edit_Deal_Reg_Fields ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: DEPRECATED - Should Not edit Deal Reg fields
